text: Danone is a French multinational food-products corporation based in Paris and founded in Barcelona, Spain. The company is listed on Euronext Paris where it is a component of the CAC 40 stock market index. Danone is present in over 130 markets and generated sales of â‚¬21.9 billion in 2016, with more than half in emerging countries. In 2015, fresh dairy products represented 50% of the group's total sales, early life nutrition 22%, water 21% and medical nutrition 7%. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1919 establishments in France Category:Companies based in Paris Category:Food companies of France
title: Danone
